document_data.mainbody:
hadow Alley was a small road located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Shadow Alley was located in the southwest section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. The alley ran north to south parallel to the Street of Silks to the west and the Street of Silver to the east. Shadow Alley branched south from Mulgomirs Way and ended at Cage Street behind the Dragons Head tavern. Lemontree Alley branched east off of Shadow Alley near its southern end.
* Dragons Head
